participant_1.background:
I don't play for anyone, but I love huge paintings and my favorite food is salad.
my favorite music is jimi hendrix.
i am twenty five years old.
I want to relocate to a place where I can start my own business.
My parents have always been supportive of my dreams, and they encourage me to follow my heart.

participant_2.background:
I like to eat pizza with my family because it is a fun and easy meal to share.
I'm white, but I have a love for fighting that runs deep in my soul.
I am a loner and my family are my only friends.
I'm going to a home show to look for ideas for my dream larp room.
I found a romance novel that my girlfriend would love, but I'm afraid to tell her about it.

content.text: Hey there! How is your day going?
My day is going well! I'm off to the home show this weekend, looking for ideas for my dream larp room.
LARP stands for live action role playing. It's basically a game where you dress up as a character and act out a story.
That sounds really fun! Have you ever been to one before?
I haven't, but I've been wanting to try it for a while. I'm excited to see what it's all about.
Well I hope you have a great time!
So what do you like to do for fun?
I like to play video games, watch movies, and read. I also like to go to the gym and play sports.
Nice! What kind of video games do you play?
I play a lot of different games, but my favorites are RPGs and fighting games.
Those are fun! I'm a big fan of RPGs too.
I really like the Witcher 3. It's a really big and immersive game.
I've heard good things about that game. I'll have to check it out.
You should! It's a lot of fun.
